data.comment: The match has started at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Lyon are coming forward and Memphis Depay gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 1, It's a goal kick for the home team in Metz.
Lyon have a goal kick.
Lyon's Karl Toko Ekambi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Metz defender.
In the minute 4, Tino Kadewere (Lyon) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Lyon's Houssem Aouar breaks free at Stade Saint Symphorien. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Karim Abed awards Metz a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Penalty! Karim Abed points to the spot, great chance for Metz...
Metz are awarded a penalty at Stade Saint Symphorien. Farid Boulaya takes the kick ... But misses!
Lyon to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
In the minute 8, Karim Abed signals a Lyon throw-in in Metz's half.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Metz.
In the minute 13, Karim Abed signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Can Lyon capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Lyon take a 0-1 lead thanks to Memphis Depay.
In the minute 17, That's a fine assist from Karl Toko Ekambi.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Metz's half?
Free kick for Lyon in the half of Metz.
In the minute 21, Karim Abed signals a free kick to Lyon.
Lyon's Houssem Aouar gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
In the minute 23, Free kick Metz.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
In the minute 26, Karim Abed awards Lyon a goal kick.
Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Pape Matar Sarr (Metz) gets a yellow card.
Lyon have a goal kick.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
In the minute 33, Memphis Depay for Lyon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
Goal kick for Lyon at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 37, Lyon drives forward and Houssem Aouar gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Memphis Depay of Lyon smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Tino Kadewere of Lyon gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Lyon.
Lyon attack but Marcelo's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Metz.
In the minute 42, Karim Abed awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Lyon's Tino Kadewere gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 43, Lyon have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In Metz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, Metz needs to be cautious. Lyon have an attacking throw-in.
The first half has been concluded at Stade Saint Symphorien.
The second-half is underway in Metz.
In the minute 46, Warren Tchimbembe is on a sub for Pape Matar Sarr for Metz.
Frederic Antonetti is making the team's second substitution at Stade Saint Symphorien with Aaron Leya Iseka replacing Thierry Ambrose.
Goal! Karl Toko Ekambi extends Lyon's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 47, Houssem Aouar with an assist there.
Throw-in for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Throw-in for Metz close to the penalty box.
In the minute 51, Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Metz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in Lyon.
Opa Nguette (Metz) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 53, Attention is being given to Lyonâ€™s Anthony Lopes and play has been suspended briefly.
Anthony Lopes has recovered and rejoins the match in Metz.
Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Memphis Depay for Lyon is back on the field again.
In the minute 56, Memphis Depay is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Lyon take a comfortable 0-3 lead thanks to Karl Toko Ekambi.
In the minute 60, Lucas Paqueta instrumental with a fine assist.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
The home team replace Victorien Angban with Kiki.
In the minute 63, Moussa Dembele is replacing Tino Kadewere for the away team.
Lyon make their second substitution with Maxence Caqueret replacing Houssem Aouar.
Lyon make their third substitution with Leo Dubois replacing Mattia De Sciglio.
In the minute 66, Metz have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
Karim Abed awards Lyon a goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Metz close to the penalty box.
In the minute 67, Metz surge into the attack at Stade Saint Symphorien but Aaron Leya Isekaâ€™s header is off-target.
Lyon have a goal kick.
Metz are pushing forward but Habib Maiga's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 68, It's a goal kick for the away team in Metz.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
In the minute 70, Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
In Metz, Memphis Depay of Lyon is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Goal kick for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 72, Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Metz, Lyon push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Metz's Habib Maiga gets in a shot on goal at Stade Saint Symphorien. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Metz.
Goal! Metz reduce the deficit to 1-3 through Farid Boulaya.
Great play from Opa Nguette to set up the goal.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
Metz pushes forward through Kiki, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Metz.
Metz's Fabien Centtonze is on target but unsuccessful.
Metz are pushing forward but Dylan Bronn's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 79, It's a goal kick for the away team in Metz.
The away team replace Memphis Depay with Rayan Cherki.
Lyon are coming forward and Karl Toko Ekambi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 81, Karim Abed signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
The match at Stade Saint Symphorien has been interrupted briefly for a check on Bruno Guimaraes, who is down injured.
Sinaly Diomande is on a sub for Bruno Guimaraes for Lyon.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Metz are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 87, Karim Abed signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
John Boye (Metz) is red-carded and dismissed.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Metz.
In the minute 89, Metz drive upfield and Farid Boulaya gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lyon defender.
Free kick for Metz in the half of Lyon.
At Stade Saint Symphorien the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In Metz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Rayan Cherki for Lyon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Metz have a goal kick.
Alexandre Oukidja returns to the field for Metz after picking up a slight injury.
That's full-time at Stade Saint Symphorien. The final score is 1-3.
Alexandre Oukidja is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Rayan Cherki (Lyon) has been sent off!
The home team has substituted Alexandre Oukidja with Marc-Aurele Caillard. Frederic Antonetti is thus making his fourth change.
